LongDescription:
Felicity for your Television. 

Felicity is a theme that takes everything great about iOS/tvOS icon design and pushes it further with brighter colours, sharper glyphs and deeper shadows.

Whilst Felicity stays close to appleâ€™s original design, the changes it brings will provide a more pleasant and beautiful experience when using your devices. Get it now and try it out!
